cv.abstract: I'm a leading **mathematical software engineer**, and founder of **Math.Software**. I work with computational mathematical models and strong software engineering foundations optimizing for functional programming.

entries.title: Software Engineer
entries.description: I performed ML roles for combating digital fraud, standing by the Y-Combinator Startup culture, where I:
items: Expanded document support, experimented with potential techniques, and worked datasets out.
Applied newer machine/deep learning skills in short iterations for fraud detection and object detection on ID documents.
Developed in-house tools for my daily job and helped mates get unblocked internally.
entries.footer: Tech: **OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Jira (Scrum), Bitbucket, AWS, Go, Vue.js**

entries.title: Mathematics, Engineering Intern
entries.description: I contributed to developing ML and DS research while developing ERP web apps and the company website. I completed a Mexican scholarship for the activities I performed. Tech: **Python**, **Deepnote**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vue.js**.

entries.title: Engineering Intern
entries.description: I worked in a team to develop a tourism application (Virtravl) where I developed a full backend API in **Nest.js** with **Amazon AWS** services, managed operations, and helped with the **MySQL** database and the **Vue.js** frontend.

entries.title: MathSwe
entries.description: I continuously apply my mathematical and engineering background to modernize mathematics.
